work_confirmation.title: Create Work Confirmation
work_confirmation.description: Step-by-step guide to create a work confirmation in Oracle EBS R12 i-Supplier

steps.title: Login to i-Supplier Portal
steps.description: Access the Oracle EBS R12 i-Supplier portal using your credentials
steps.instructions: Navigate to the i-Supplier portal URL and enter your username and password

steps.title: Navigate to Work Confirmations
steps.description: Access the Work Confirmations section from the main menu
steps.instructions: Click on 'Procurement' in the main menu, then select 'Work Confirmations'

steps.title: Create New Work Confirmation
steps.description: Initiate the creation of a new work confirmation
steps.instructions: Click the 'Create' button to start a new work confirmation

steps.title: Select Purchase Order
steps.description: Choose the purchase order for which you want to create the work confirmation
steps.instructions: Use the search functionality to find and select the appropriate purchase order

steps.title: Enter Confirmation Details
steps.description: Fill in the work confirmation details including quantities and dates
steps.instructions: Enter the confirmed quantity, completion date, and any additional notes

steps.title: Review and Submit
steps.description: Review all entered information and submit the work confirmation
steps.instructions: Verify all details are correct and click 'Submit' to finalize the confirmation

view_purchase_orders.title: View Purchase Orders
view_purchase_orders.description: How to view and search purchase orders in i-Supplier

steps.title: Login to i-Supplier Portal
steps.description: Access the Oracle EBS R12 i-Supplier portal
steps.instructions: Navigate to the i-Supplier portal and login with your credentials

steps.title: Search Purchase Orders
steps.description: Use search filters to find specific purchase orders
steps.instructions: Enter search criteria such as PO number, date range, or status

invoice_submission.title: Submit Invoice
invoice_submission.description: Process for submitting invoices through i-Supplier

steps.title: Login to i-Supplier Portal
steps.description: Access the Oracle EBS R12 i-Supplier portal
steps.instructions: Navigate to the i-Supplier portal and login

steps.title: Create New Invoice
steps.instructions: Click 'Create Invoice' and select the invoice type

steps.title: Enter Invoice Information
steps.description: Fill in all required invoice details
steps.instructions: Enter invoice number, date, amount, and line item details

steps.title: Attach Supporting Documents
steps.instructions: Click 'Attach' to upload receipts, delivery notes, or other documents

steps.title: Submit Invoice for Processing
steps.instructions: Review all details and click 'Submit' to send for approval
